name: Capture Christmas
description:
Capture Christmas!

How to Play

Capture 4 or more tiles in a row to claim the row’s points. If a row is evenly split between the player and the computer (3/3) then no one gets the row’s points. If you capture a tile in a row the enemy controls, then 2 points are subtracted from the row’s total points. When the computer captures a square, the tile will be replaced with a blue present. When you capture a square, the tile will be replaced with a red present.

Once all the tiles have been captured, the points in each row are awarded to the player or the computer. Whoever has the most points wins!

To play a new game, press the Reset button on the right side of the screen.

Tiles

There are 7 unique tiles: Snowflake, Snowman, Red Candy Cane, Purple Candy Cane, Sleigh, Gingerbread Man, Christmas Tree.

Each tile captures a unique pattern on the board:


 The Snowflake captures an individual tile.
 The Snowman captures all the tiles surrounding it.
 The Red Candy Cane captures all the tiles in a left diagonal line.
 The Purple Candy Cane captures all the tiles in a right diagonal line.
 The Sleigh captures all the tiles in a horizontal line.
 The Gingerbread Man captures all the tiles in a horizontal and vertical line.
 The Christmas Tree captures all the tiles in a vertical line.
